name: color-command
description: Represents a color command for lighting control, specifying the operation and associated parameters.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: The color operation to be performed.

fields.name: target-color
fields.description: The target color in XY color space. Optional.

fields.name: target-color-temperature
fields.description: The target correlated color temperature in Kelvin. Optional.

fields.name: fade-time
fields.description: The fade time in milliseconds, ranging from 100 ms to 86400000 ms (24 hours). Optional.

fields.name: ramp-rate
fields.description: The ramp rate in Kelvin per second, ranging from 1 to 30000. Optional.

fields.name: step-increment
fields.description: The step increment in Kelvin for step operations, ranging from 1 to 30000. Optional.
